FileWriter Class Reference

This class simplifies the interface of using operations related to writing information to a file (like a Facade pattern). More...

Detailed Description

This class simplifies the interface of using operations related to writing information to a file (like a Facade pattern).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

explicit
Parameters
fileNamepath to a file. If the file did not exist it will be created.
append(default value is false) must specify if the file should be appended (true) or over-written (false).
